page.title: 20Kinpurney Farm
page.content:
Mr.Ewan Mitchell is the farmer.It is a large farm including the whole of Kinpurney Hill which is under grass.A few years ago a large part was {reclaimed}from the wild.He keeps sheep and cattle on this land. He grows barley and{fruit}on his lower land.He also grows potatoes, peas,turnips,oil seed rape,carrots and gras for hay. Many children and adults pick {raspberries}and{strawberries }in July and August.The farmer paid 5p per pound for{strawberries}and 12p per basket for raspberries this year.Four buses bring pickers from Dundee and Newtyle. Picking starts at 7.30 a.m.and finishes at 4.30p.m.
Carol-Ann Mcpherson & Ann Harris David Webster & Della Robertson P.6.
